title: Character limit too small
body:
I tried porting over my post from the other forum, but about 1/3 of my post got cut off.  Can you put the character limit on the sidebar, or have a character counter during typing?  Like for example, 531 characters remaining or something.

Topic in question: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4225940&highlight=

replies.body: We just bumped the character limit up so you should be able to repost your thread!
Cool! I literally just put up a *huge* post. I tip my hat to your perfect timing.
I actually had not encountered a character limit yet, and honestly did not think about the possibility of one being there, thanks for the heads up.
